blocks.description: Roaring Twenties, pre-crash prosperity, technological innovation, cultural modernization
Great Depression, political radicalization, rise of extremism, pre-war tensions

comparative_framework.comparison_methodology: Tension matrix comparison across three periods

rating_criteria.high: Multiple documented tension indicators across dimensions
rating_criteria.medium: Clear tensions in some dimensions, documented

consistency_checks.scale_consistency: Rating scale applied consistently across all blocks
consistency_checks.data_avoidance: No inflation of 'high' ratings for dramatic effect

mgk_principles.principle_1_reality_over_narrative: enforced - data_level contains only verifiable facts
mgk_principles.principle_2_metaphors_as_tools: enforced - no metaphorical language in data/discourse/structure levels
mgk_principles.principle_3_no_teleology: enforced - no deterministic language, no projection to 1939+ events
mgk_principles.principle_5_level_separation: enforced - four distinct JSON sections maintained
mgk_principles.principle_6_uncertainty_marked: enforced - all interpretations marked with confidence levels

next_steps: Create comparative analysis report (1998-2001 vs 1925-1929 vs 1930-1939)
Validate rating consistency across all three blocks
